content: In what popular fantasy series would you find characters named Frodo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey?

I'm happy to help! The characters Frodo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey are from the popular fantasy series "The Lord of the Rings" by J.R.R. Tolkien. This series is a classic in the genre and has captivated readers for generations with its rich world-building, intricate plots, and unforgettable characters. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
